#summary Getting Started with Narrator

==Running the Latest Version of the Narrator Application== 

 # Install the latest version of JDK  
 # Download and run the Narrator Installer
 # Run the Narrator.jar file in your Narrator Folder (the installer creates a shortcut in your Start Menu to do this)

===Notes===

 # The documentation file explains how to use the application, and how to change and edit prototypes  
 # New Models can be saved as rdf files
